_header: Say well is a worthy thing
_description: Verses advocating that Do well is preferable to Say well — nine quatrains and burden, or 42 lines in couplets with burden: ‘Saye well & do well þey are thynges twayne / thryse happy ys he in whome bothe dothe rayne’.

Banna.First Lines:
Say weill is trewly ane wirthy gud thingoff say weill grit vertew
                    dois out spring…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Say weill and doweill ar thingis twaneThryss happy is he
                    quhome in thay do remane
Banna.Note: 21 couplets in this MS (usually 9 quatrains and burden).
